data.persona: I am a fierce hunter. I bring down mermaids. I spend most of my time on the high seas.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Store.
This store is a small one room stone building with wares laid about on tables.  One can see fishing poles, wooden buckets with dirt and bait inside, along with some mounted trophies.
There's a clean shirt, some clean pants, and a clean rag here.
A fish seller is here.

You are carrying a skeleton.

data.short_motivation: I will hit the fish seller to remind him who I am.
data.mid_motivation: I will use my new reputation to find a better hunting/fishing spot.
data.long_motivation: I will be able to catch more fish/game and make more money.
